body: Annie Lee from China Hush translates a news story from CN Reviews on a dispute between a disabled passenger, Zheng Wei Ning, who is member of Shenzhen CPPCC Standing Committee and the Shenzhen Airline. Zheng declared to have hired attorney team to file public interest litigation against Shenzhen Airline and claim for over 10 million yuan compensation.

Zheng declared to have hired attorney team to file public interest litigation against Shenzhen Airline and claim for over 10 million yuan compensation.
title: China: Rejected disabled passenger demanded compensation
